So many characters to choose from...

topics.body: I cannot wait for the second Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth to come out for the PC.
topics.author: 4fdef063945b700a9d01604f

topics.body:
"@norikago":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555f24056368723dd3ac2a00#post_555f24056368723dd3ac2a00
Yep.
The first guy can use cards and that is kinda a gamble since the special effects are random so you won't know what cards you can get.
The guy with the katana has a strong attack but he can't run so to chase an enemy would be his weakpoint.
The bladewhip girl has a moderate range and her attacks are fast but the time for the attacks to end can be quite troublesome (in fact, I died from the first boss because of this. I couldn't dodge since she didn't finish her attack in time.)
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
